quizzes.question: Fill in the blank to create a Search Box:
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Creating a Search Box[/h1]

The new [b]search [/b]input type can be used to create a search box: [code format="html" codeId="68"]<input id="mysearch" name="searchitem" type="[b]search[/b]" />[/code]
[b]Result:[/b] [img id="2566" width="100%"]

quizzes.question:
Fill in the blanks to associate the input with the datalist:
[!raw!]
<form>
<input type="text" name="color"
        {0}="colors" />
<datalist id="{1}">
   <option value="Red">
   <option value="Blue">
   <option value="Green">
</{2}>
</form>
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Search Options[/h1]

The [b]<datalist>[/b] tag can be used to define a list of pre-defined options for the search field: [code format="html" codeId="69"]<input id="car" type="text" [b]list[/b]="colors" />
<[b]datalist id[/b]="colors">
   <option value="Red">
   <option value="Green">
   <option value="Yellow">
</datalist>[/code]
[b]Result:[/b] [img id="2567" width="100%"]
[b]<option>[/b] defines the options in a drop-down list for the user to select. 
[note]The ID of the datalist element must match with the list attribute of the input box.[/note]
